notes: Spacious older-style apartment (46 ping) in Beitou managed by UR HOUSE (foreigner-friendly agency), with dated but well-maintained furnishings including leather sofas, crystal chandeliers, wooden cabinetry, and marble-tile floors. The kitchen has older gas stove and basic appliances, and the bathroom has a glass-partition shower; the bedroom is large with hardwood floors and good natural light from windows. For baby safety, the marble/tile living area floors can be slippery, the glass display cabinet has accessible shelves, and the bedroom has a raised platform bed frame with sharp corners; no balcony or stairway hazards are visible, and on 5F of a 7-story building the elevator status is unclear.
